prompt:
You are a medical consultation expert.
Your task is to create NEW medical consultation Q&A pairs that follow the same format and style as the examples below.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Generate COMPLETELY NEW scenarios (not copies of examples)
2. Match the format, style, and quality exactly as shown in the examples
3. Provide clear, detailed doctor responses
4. Cover different medical topics if possible

EXAMPLES (study the format carefully):

================================================================================
Example 1:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: why do I have a big belly

PATIENT: hello doctor I am a 23 year old male my height is 6 and weight is 74 keg I have a big belly with the rest of my body being a little leaner I have continuous hunger even after I have had food after a meal with five roti and a cup of rice I will feel hungry within an hour or two I have zero activity I sit in front of the computer for nearly seven to eight hours every day is there any tests that I could take to know if anything is wrong I have no sugar and be thank you for the advice in advance

DOCTOR: hi we are here to help you for further information consult an internal medicine physician online

STATUS: low severity

================================================================================
Example 2:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: what causes dark and foul smelling urine

PATIENT: hello doctor I have had every sad screen known to man and kidney function tests my urine is foul smelling and dark this has been an ongoing issue for a year and it has started to affect my life I have tried everything antibiotics hydration douche apple cider vinegar ago pills yeast infection drugs ti drugs

DOCTOR: hello foul smelling and dark urine is indicative of cystitis with highly concentrated urine if there is no blood or hematuria then renal pathology is unlikely or calculus you need to take at least to liters of water daily and foul smell is often vaginal and not in urine you may be suffering from bacterial vaginosis causing a foul smell avoid using soaps in the genital region while bathing use vaginal alkaline washes

STATUS: low severity

================================================================================
Example 3:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: why do I hear my heartbeat only in right ear while bending down

PATIENT: hello doctor I am a 35 year old male I can hear my heartbeat in my right ear when I bend towards my knee in any other position like standing or lying down I do not hear this heartbeat sound my hearing test is normal is it normal to hear this heartbeat sound when a person bends his head towards his knee also I am hearing it only in my right ear is it normal

DOCTOR: hi we are here to help you most commonly such feeling of heartbeat known as palpitations is absolutely normal however this could be due to anxiety issues I would recommend you to get your electrocardiogram egg and thyearoid profile done and write back to me with reports revert back with the reports to a cardiologist online

STATUS: low severity

================================================================================
NOW: Generate a NEW unique medical consultation scenario following the EXACT same format above:

DESCRIPTION: [brief medical question]
PATIENT: [detailed patient narrative]
DOCTOR: [clear, detailed medical advice - write naturally, don't worry about formatting]
STATUS: [low severity / medium severity / high severity]

Generate ONLY the new scenario, no meta-commentary.
api_response:
DESCRIPTION: why do I get dizzy when standing up quickly

PATIENT: hello doctor I am a 28 year old female whenever I stand up quickly from sitting or lying position I feel dizzy and my vision gets blurry for few seconds this has been happening for about six months I have checked my blood pressure which is normal when sitting but I haven't measured it while standing I drink about two liters of water daily and eat regular meals I don't have any other health issues and take no medications is this something I should be concerned about

DOCTOR: hello what you're experiencing is likely orthostatic hypotension where blood pressure drops when changing positions this is common and often harmless but should be evaluated try rising slowly from seated or lying positions and ensure adequate hydration and salt intake if symptoms persist I recommend checking blood pressure in both sitting and standing positions and getting basic blood tests including complete blood count and electrolyte levels to rule out anemia or dehydration

STATUS: low severity

parsed_scenario.Patient: hello doctor I am a 28 year old female whenever I stand up quickly from sitting or lying position I feel dizzy and my vision gets blurry for few seconds this has been happening for about six months I have checked my blood pressure which is normal when sitting but I haven't measured it while standing I drink about two liters of water daily and eat regular meals I don't have any other health issues and take no medications is this something I should be concerned about
